title: Bug 124777 - Setting blank tooltip in chart title causes exception during preview
OB: When attempting to preview a chart with a blank tooltip set in the title, an exception occurs.
EB: Previewing a chart with a blank tooltip in the title should not result in an exception and should handle the scenario gracefully.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new simple chart.
2. Enable title interactivity: mouse over/show tooltip.
   - Leave the tooltip text blank.
   - Click the 'Add' button.
3. Attempt to preview the chart.
